name: Anti-Designator Freeze Designator, Crewed (aDFDC-11)
description: The freeze anti-designator senses marking of a freeze designator and targets the designator. The anti-designator can automatically fire a weapon at the designator or await a user's command to do so.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
